front.title: IEEE Trial-Use Standard for Wireless Access in Vehicular Environments (WAVE) - Networking Services

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: WAVE networking services provides services to WAVE devices and systems. It represents roughly layers 3 and 4 of the OSI model and the IP, UDP, and TCP elements of the Internet model. The services provided include management and data services within WAVE devices.
